name: CaremergeVoice
0:
”Alexa, ask my community what are the announcements”
”Alexa, ask my community what is the status of my work order?”
”Alexa, ask my community has the mail arrived?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my community
des:
Caremerge Voice skill helps Caremerge Community residents with daily tasks. You can ask for safety check-in, events happening in the community and your registered events.
You need to link your skill with your Caremerge account first. That's it. After that, all queries will follow that linked account in response.
